section.p: You are on a road between Caran Baru and Trefoille. You come to the Weary Pilgrim Tavern, a waystation between the cities. The tavern costs you 1 Shard a day. Each day you spend here you can recover 1 Stamina point if injured, up to the limit of your normal unwounded Stamina score.

If you want to spend 3 Shards buying drinks all round so you can glean some rumours,
turn to 666
.
To leave, you can go:

choices.choice: West into the Forest of Larun
